text: Another drug re-discovered for #coronavirus: #camostat, approved in Japan, blocks SARS-CoV-2 (current virus, https://t.co/MfHaQbyJRI preprint) in cells, and showed benefit in mice with the 96% identical SARS-CoV (PMID 25666761, pic). With #chloroquine and #remdesivir, that's 3! https://t.co/YE3WnDHTAJ https://t.co/89GRrgOYgH
